testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

Sam must be one of the most promising brilliant developers I've ever met! If you hire him he'd catapult your company in no time. His university training is as good as on actual job performance. I am confident that he will be your topnotch developers in no time!
